name: Calculate Hours for Title, Symbols and Index
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA Title Page and Sheet Index Symbols Notes and Legend:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((4*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Title Page Sheet Index (1-20))*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Symbols Notes and Legend (0-2))*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Title Page Sheet Index (1-20))*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Symbols Notes and Legend (0-2))*>))*0.25)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(((4*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Title Page Sheet Index (1-20))*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Symbols Notes and Legend (0-2))*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Title Page Sheet Index (1-20))*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Symbols Notes and Legend (0-2))*>))*0.25))*0.8) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(FDA GES Location)*>,None))){<* Eval((((4*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Title Page Sheet Index (1-20))*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Symbols Notes and Legend (0-2))*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Title Page Sheet Index (1-20))*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Symbols Notes and Legend (0-2))*>))*0.25))*0.8)*1.1) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
